scopingsheet_markdown:
Scoping Sheet for FinSecureApp

   | Category | Requirement | Status |
   | --- | :-------------------------------- |:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | Application Overview | Application Name | FinSecureApp |
   | Application Overview | Production URL | https://finsecure.com |
   | Application Overview | Environment for Testing | ['Staging'] |
   | Application Overview | Application Type | ['Web', 'API'] |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Authentication Method | ['Username & Password', 'SSO'] |
   | Authentication & Access Control | User Roles | ['Anonymous Users', 'Regular Users', 'Power Users', 'Administrators', 'System Administrators'] |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Custom Roles | 2 |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Management | ['JWT'] |
   | Authentication & Access Control | Session Timeout Period | 20 |
   | Input Processing | total_num_input_fields | 15 |
   | Input Processing | Input Types Present | ['Free text fields', 'File uploads (Types allowed: .pdf, .png)', 'Payment information', 'Personal data', 'API calls'] |
   | Data Processing | Sensitive Data Handled | ['Personal Information', 'Financial Data'] |
   | Data Processing | Data Storage | ['Local Database', 'Cloud Storage'] |
   | API Details | Number of Endpoints | 20 |
   | API Details | Authentication Required | Yes |
   | API Details | Rate Limiting | Yes |
   | API Details | Documentation Available | Yes |
   | API Details | API Methods | ['GET', 'POST', 'PUT'] |
   | Infrastructure | Security Controls Present | ['WAF', 'IPS/IDS', 'Load Balancer', 'Anti-DDoS'] |
   | Infrastructure | Hosting | ['Cloud'] |
   | Business Logic | Critical Functions | ['Financial Transactions', 'User Data Management'] |
   | Security Requirements | Compliance Requirements | ['PCI DSS', 'GDPR'] |
   | Security Requirements | Previous Testing | 10/12/2023 |
   | Security Requirements | Known Vulnerabilities | none reported |
   | Security Requirements | Critical Assets | payment gateway, user accounts |
   | Testing Constraints | Time Restrictions | ['24/7 Allowed'] |
   | Testing Constraints | Testing Limitations | ['No Destructive Testing'] |
   | Deliverables | Required Reports | ['Executive Summary', 'Technical Details', 'Remediation Plan', 'Risk Rating'] |
   | Notes | Additional Information | Application uses two-factor authentication for all roles. API rate limits enforced at 500 requests per minute |
   | Client Contact Information | Client Email | aliceBrown@outlook.com |

requirement_df.status: Application uses two-factor authentication for all roles. API rate limits enforced at 500 requests per minute
